import React, { useState } from 'react' import './InputForm.css' function InputForm() { const [userInput, setUserInput] = useState({ currentSavings: '', yearlySavings: '', expectedInterest: '', investmentDuration: '' }) const inputChangeHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const { value, id } = e.target setUserInput((previousState) => { return { ...previousState, [id]: value } }) } return (

) } export default InputForm
